alert.note: Alert for Otero Mesa (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Otero County through 400 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles southeast of Orogrande, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Otero Mesa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
